```{r data experience area chart}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
library(echarts4r)
# Import custom theme
  # obj = fromJSON("./area_chart_portfolio.json")


data_experience <- data.frame(
  Category = c(
    "Analysis", "Data Exploration", "Data Cleaning", "Dashboards", "Programming", "Reports"
  ),
  R = c(4, 4, 5, 3, 4, 4),
  Excel = c(4, 3, 3, 1, 2, 3),
  SQL = c(1, 2, 2, 1, 2, 1)
)

trans <- list(opacity = 0.4) # transparency
emphasis <- list(itemStyle = list(color = "#C70039", borderWidth = 0))

plot <- data_experience |> 
  e_charts(Category) |>
  e_radar(R, max = 5, name = "R", emphasis = emphasis, areaStyle = list(color = "#746D6B", opacity = 0.4), lineStyle = list(width = 6)) |>
  e_radar(Excel, max = 5, name = "Excel", emphasis = emphasis) |>
  e_radar(SQL, max = 5, name = "SQL", emphasis = emphasis) |>
  e_title("Data Experience") |>
  e_tooltip(trigger = "item") |> 
  e_radar_opts(
    #list(
      #areaStyle = list(color= c(r_color, excel_color, sql_color), opacity = 0.3),
      lineStyle = list(width = 2)
      #)
    ) |> 
  e_theme_custom('{
                "color":["#00FEF4","#EC00FE","#FFC300"],
                "radar_opt":{
                  "areaStyle":{
                    "color":["#00FEF4","#EC00FE","#FFC300"]
                  }
                },
                "grid": {
                  "top": "10%" 
                },
                "textStyle":{
                   "color":"#FFFFFF",
                   "fontWeight": "bold",
                   "fontSize": "1.2em",
                   "textShadowColor": "#000000",
                   "textShadowBlur": 5,
                   "textShadowOffsetX": 3,
                   "textShadowOffsetY": 3
               },
               "category":{
                "textStyle":{
                  "color": "#FFFFFF",
                  "fontWeight": "bold",
                  "fontSize": "1.2em"
                }
               },
               "backgroundColor":"rgba(76, 67, 65, 0)",
               "legend": {
                "top": "10%",
                "left": "0%",
                "itemGap": 35,
                  "textStyle": {
                    "color": "#FFFFFF" 
                  }
               },
                "title": {
                  "textStyle": {
                    "color": "#FFFFFF",
                    "fontWeight": "bold",
                    "fontSize": "1.6em"
                  }
                }
               }')

# Display the plot
plot
```
